objective.title: Career Objective
objective.content: Accomplished Senior Site Reliability Engineer with extensive experience designing and scaling cloud-native architectures on AWS and implementing AI-driven operations (AIOps) for predictive monitoring, automation, and incident response. Proven track record in leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-availability, secure, and cost-efficient systems through infrastructure as code (IaC), observability frameworks, and intelligent automation. Adept at leveraging machine learning models, data-driven insights, and DevOps best practices to improve resilience, accelerate deployments, and drive operational excellence. Seeking to lead cloud reliability and AI adoption initiatives that empower organizations to innovate and operate at scale.
